hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# GROUP=nova if [ "$TEST_USER" = "" ]; then export TEST_USER=dbox fi TEST_BASE=`getent passwd $TEST_USER | cut -d: -f6 ` if [ "$GIT_DIR" = "" ]; then GIT_DIR=$TEST_BASE/jobsub fi if [ "$JOBSUB_SERVER" = "" ]; then JOBSUB_SERVER=`hostname` fi if [ "$X509_USER_CERT" = "" ]; then X509_USER_CERT=$TEST_BASE/.globus/dbox.digicert.cert.pem X509_USER_KEY=$TEST_BASE/.globus/dbox.digicert.decrypted.key.pem fi SOURCE_ME=/tmp/jobsub_test_env_$$ echo "export X509_USER_CERT=$X509_USER_CERT" > $SOURCE_ME echo "export X509_USER_KEY=$X509_USER_KEY" >> $SOURCE_ME echo "export GROUP=$GROUP" >> $SOURCE_ME echo "export SKIP_PRODUCTION_TEST=YES" >> $SOURCE_ME echo "export SKIP_CDF_TEST=YES" >> $SOURCE_ME
cd $GIT_DIR/test/client sudo -u $TEST_USER ./integration_test.sh $JOBSUB_SERVER $SOURCE_ME RSLT=$? if [ "$RSLT" = "0" ]; then rm $SOURCE_ME fi exit $RSLT
